thread.title: ECB Puts Moratorium on Latvia’s ABLV Bank Amid Treasury Department Probe

author: Tom Fairless
title: ECB Puts Moratorium on Latvia’s ABLV Bank Amid Treasury Department Probe

organizations.name: ablv bank amid treasury department probe the european central bank

text:
The European Central Bank Monday said it had stopped all payments by one of Latvia’s largest banks, in the latest blow to the financial sector of the small Baltic nation after its central-bank governor was arrested over the weekend by anti-graft agents.
In a statement, the ECB said it had imposed “temporarily, and until further notice, a prohibition of all payments” by ABLV Bank, Latvia’s third-largest lender by assets.
